name: Helm of Valor
description: A helm forged by skilled blacksmiths, granting courage in battle.

name: Crown of the Ancients
description: An ancient crown that bestows wisdom upon the wearer.

name: Visage of Shadows
description: A sinister mask that grants mastery over the darkness.

name: Helm of the Storm
description: A helm that channels the power of lightning, granting thunderous attacks.

name: Mask of Serenity
description: A serene mask that enhances focus and control in combat.
